fr.aumgn.bukkitutils.localization

Class Localization

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.aumgn.bukkitutils.localization.Localization
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommandsLocalization

    public class Localization
extends Object
    Class which handles loading of localization resources for the given plugin and locale. This class looks for resources in the plugin's jarfile (in the plugin's package) and in the plugin's data folder. Resources are defined by a name to which is appended a suffix corresponding to the locale. For example if you're looking for a resource with the name "messages" for the plugin MyPlugin whose main class is "fr.aumgn.myplugin.MyPlugin" and the locale "fr_FR", the class will go through all this steps :
    • Looks for the resource fr/aumgn/myplugin/messages_en.{json,yml,properties} in the jarfile
    • Looks for the resource [server]/plugins/MyPlugin/messages_en.{json,yml,properties}
    • Looks for the resource fr/aumgn/myplugin/messages_en_US.{json,yml,properties} in the jarfile
    • Looks for the resource [server]/plugins/MyPlugin/messages_en_US.{json,yml,properties}
    • Looks for the resource fr/aumgn/myplugin/messages_fr.{json,yml,properties} in the jarfile
    • Looks for the resource [server]/plugins/MyPlugin/messages_fr.{json,yml,properties}
    • Looks for the resource fr/aumgn/myplugin/messages_fr_FR.{json,yml,properties} in the jarfile
    • Looks for the resource [server]/plugins/MyPlugin/messages_fr_FR.{json,yml,properties}
    Each values find in a loaded resources has priority over values find in previous resources.
